r.d: A generic rendering package for PhD
r.n: - Allow link to methodsynopsis (Jakub Vrana) - Got rid of presentational tags: <b>, <i>, <tt> changed to <strong>, <em>, <code> (Alexey Borzov) - Make presentational attributes on table related-tags (align, valign, width) output as inline styles (Alexey Borzov) - Fixed ID generation for refsections (Alexey Borzov)
